title: The Bachelorette star Carlin Sterritt's estranged wife exposed
text:
Bachelorette Angie Kent was left speechless on Thursday night's episode when star Carlin Sterritt confessed he was technically still married.

And now, Daily Mail Australia can reveal the TV star's estranged wife as being the stunning New Zealand real estate agent Taran Higgins,

Photos have emerged of the former couple, who married in 2016 at the Sirromet Winery in Queensland, during happier times.

Look out Angie Kent! The estranged wife of Bachelorette star Carlin Sterritt (L) is REVEALED as stunning New Zealand real estate clerk Taran Higgins (R) - Pictured in 2016

Blindsided! Bachelorette Angie Kent (ABOVE) was left speechless on Thursday night's episode when star Carlin confessed he was technically still married

Taran and Carlin moved to Australia from New Zealand shortly before marrying in a lavish ceremony.

Following their separation, Taran moved back to New Zealand and works as an office administrator for a real estate agency.

In one picture, the pair pose alongside one another and smile while Taran wears a wedding gown and Carlin looks sharp in a tuxedo.

The photo uploaded to a bridal page is captioned: 'These two gorgeous creatures helped bring a dream to life yesterday as the faces of the new campaign!'

Another snap also shows the former couple smiling while seated next to one another in a restaurant.

Moving on: Following their separation, Taran moved back to New Zealand and now works as an office administrator for a real estate agency (Pictured in 2016)

History: Taran (pictured) and Carlin moved to Australia from New Zealand shortly before getting married in 2016 at the Sirromet Winery in Queensland

Meanwhile, during Thursday night's episode, Carlin admitted that he was technically still married to his estranged wife.

After landing a 24-hour date with Angie, he confessed his divorce hadn't yet been officially finalised.

'I am the type of guy who wants to be open and transparent, because, you know, there's no other way to do it. I am... married,' he stammered.

'I am... married!' During Thursday night's episode, Carlin (pictured) told Angie Kent that he was technically still married to his estranged wife

His revelation prompted a shell-shocked Angie to laugh nervously in response.

'In 2016, I, um... I got married. We've been apart for a year-and-a-half,' he continued, claiming he and his wife simply 'drifted apart'.

'I was pretty hurt in the process, and she's moved overseas now. So, like, for me that was sort of like, you know, I was, like, I've closed that chapter of my life.'
description: Bachelorette Angie Kent was left speechless on Thursday night's episode when star Carlin Sterritt confessed he was technically still married.
authors: Mary Mrad For Daily Mail Australia
